name: School Bus Driver City Driving
description: In this amazing game, you do not only transport students from home to school in the morning, you have to pick them from high schools & drop them home. Steer the bus carefully and become the best driver in the town. When you reach to final location on the road map then you have to park the school van very accurately in the given parking area to pick the college students.So what are you waiting for buckle up and be ready to experience this wonderful game.
